description: This file implements a timer class (TpTimer) and its associated job (TpTimerJob) within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace. It provides functionalities for starting, stopping, and configuring timers, including support for single-shot and recurring timers, with callback mechanisms for timer expiry.

classes.name: TpTimer
classes.description: A timer class that manages scheduling and execution of timed callbacks, supporting features like single-shot execution and interval configuration.

classes.name: TpTimerJob
classes.description: Represents the job associated with TpTimer to trigger timed callbacks when scheduled.
